Name: Spear
Power: Readied - Strikes first when charged in the front

Name: Mace
Power: AP 1 - Reduce block rolls by 1

Name: Hand Axe
Power: Multiwound 2 - Each hit does 2 wounds to a single model

Name: Second Weapon
Power: Offhand - Double the number of attacks. Can't equip a shield Unwieldy - Your rolls to hit in melee are reduced by 1

Name: Shield
Power: Block 1 - Improve the model's block by 1

Name: Pike
Power: Readied - Strikes first when charged in the front Charge Defense - When a unit moves into the square in front of this unit, this unit attacks them. They fight in combat as normal. This counts towards combat resolution.

Name: Sledgehammer
Power: AP 2 - Reduce block rolls by 2.

Name: Battleaxe
Power: Multiwound 3 - Each hit does 3 wounds to a single model AP 1 - Reduce block rolls by 1

Name: Dual Wielding
Power: Offhand - Double the number of attacks. Can't equip a shield

Name: Tower Shield
Power: Block 2 - Improve the model's block by 2 Unwieldy - Your rolls to hit in melee are reduced by 1

Name: Magic Lance
Power: Impact Hits d3 - If you get a charge bonus, do d3 attacks per model hitting on 4+. These count towards who won combat.

Name: The Greatmaul
Power: Armourbane - Gain +1 to hit against units with at least 5 block. AP 3 - Reduce block rolls by 2. Multiwound 2 - Each hit does 2 wounds to a single model. Slow - Strikes last in combat.

Name: Cleaver
Power: Cleave - Each hit does 2 wounds that can be split across multiple models.

Name: Parrying Dagger
Power: Offhand - Double the number of attacks. Can't equip a shield Unwieldy - Your rolls to hit in melee are reduced by 1 Block 1 - Improve the model's block by 1

Name: Shimmering Buckler
Power: Uncanny Protection - Block may not be reduced beneath 5.

Name: Rocks
Power: Range 2 - Hits targets 2 squares away Single Use - Can only be used once Fire on the Move - Can be used after moving

Name: Throwing Knives
Power: Range 2 - Hits targets 2 squares away Fire on the Move - Can be used after moving

Name: Throwing Stars
Power: Range 2 - Hits targets 2 squares away Poison - 6s to hit can't be saved by armour AP 1 - Reduce block rolls by 1 Fire on the Move - Can be used after moving

Name: Brace of Knives
Power: Range 2 - Hits targets 2 squares away Doubleshot - Fires twice Unbalanced - Your rolls to hit at range are reduced by 1 Fire on the Move - Can be used after moving

Name: Twigbow
Power: Range 3 - Hits targets up to 3 squares away

Name: Extra Twigbow
Power: Range 3 - Hits targets up to 3 squares away

Name: Firecrackers
Power: Range 2 - Hits targets up to 2 squares away Friendly Fire - Can fire into combat or at friendly units Single Use - Can only be used once Fire on the Move - Can be used after moving Doubleshot - Fires twice

Name: Bangbows
Power: Range 3 - Hits targets up to 3 squares away Random Wounds d3 - Each hit does d3 wounds to a single model. Owner determines the order they are applied.

Name: Weeerdbolt
Power: Spell - All parameters of this spell match the casting roll. Target unit within X takes X attacks hitting on X+. This must target a unit if possible. It may not target a unit in combat, but can target a friendly unit. It cannot target the caster. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Good Mojo
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 3, which can include the caster. This can target a unit in combat. The chosen unit rolls a d6 and gets the following effect: 6 - +1 attack this turn 5 - +1 to hit rolls this turn 4 - +1 to block this turn 3 - The unit moves forward 1 space (unless it is blocked) 2 - The unit rolls to flee 1 - Unit takes a wound with no save

Name: Wartex
Power: Spell - Target a combat with at least one combatant in range 3. Roll a die for each model in combat, they take a hit on a 5+ with AP1. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Thunda
Power: Spell - Target a unit within 2. Any unit that is affected takes 3 attacks hitting on 5+. If any attacks hit (they can be blocked), the spell chains to a new unit that is adjacent to them. Repeat this process until either all attacks miss a unit, or there are no new units to target in range. This can affect friendly units.

Name: Madmaker
Power: Spell - Target a unit within 4 that is not in combat. It moves directly forward d3 spaces until it hits an obstacle or a board edge. They strike first this turn but lose the ability to block this turn. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Pop
Power: Spell - Target friendly unit within 3 becomes explosive this turn. This can target a unit in combat. They gain +1 attack per model, hit on 2+, AP4, and die at the end of this turn. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Bone Knives
Power: Range 2 - Hits targets up to 2 squares away

Name: Bone Shortbow
Power: Range 3 - Hits targets up to 3 squares away

Name: Raise the Dead
Power: Spell - Choose an undead unit in range 3 and heal 2 wounds. This can resurrect models. Limited to the starting number of units/wounds. Cantrip - This does not count towards the limit of how many spells per turn Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Banshee's Wail
Power: Spell - All enemy models in combat with the caster roll a flee dice. Any models that fail, take 1 wound. Any units that take at least 1 wound must roll to flee.

Name: Furious Dead
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 3 that is not in combat. They can take a second move action this turn.

Name: Terrorbolt
Power: Spell - Target an enemy unit within 3 that is not in combat. It takes one attack hitting on 2+ with AP2. If the target takes a wound, it must roll to flee. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Rattlebones
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 3. This turn it may reroll block rolls, and block rolls always succeed on a 5+.

Name: Corpse Explosion
Power: Spell - Target an enemy unit in combat. After all combats have been resolved this turn, the unit suffers a ranged hit for each model (friendly and enemy) that died in the combat, hitting on 4+. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Shortbow
Power: Range 3 - Hits targets up to 3 squares away

Name: Extra Shortbow
Power: Range 3 - Hits targets up to 3 squares away

Name: Longbow
Power: Range 4 - Hits targets up to 4 squares away

Name: Silkbow
Power: Range 3 - Hits targets up to 3 squares away Fire on the Move - Can be used after moving

Name: Protective Cocoon
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit in combat within 2. Until your next turn, it gains a 1+ save (rolls of 1 still wound), can't move, can't attack, and ignores flee rolls.

Name: Poison Blood
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 2. Until your next turn, it gains poison blood. For every melee attack that hits the unit (does not need to wound), return an attack that hits on 6 with poison.

Name: Fatespin
Power: Spell - Replace the next die you roll with a 6.

Name: Shapeweave
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 3. Remove the unit from the board. At the start of your next turn, place them on any board edge. They may not take an action this turn, but can fight in combat. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Silence
Power: Spell - Target an enemy unit within 3. It loses all perks apart from racial perks until your next turn. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Envelop
Power: Spell - Target an enemy unit within 3. Until your next turn it may not take an action. It can still fight in combat. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.

Name: Fly Cowards!
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 3. It moves back 1 square as a free action.

Name: Pin Tails
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 4. It automatically passes fear tests and cannot move or rotate until your next turn.

Name: Fester
Power: Spell - Target an enemy unit within 3. It takes 3 attacks hitting on 5+ with poison.

Name: Scamper
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 3 in combat. Move it to the flank of a unit in the same combat, facing that unit.

Name: Field Promotion
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 2. It dies. Heal another friendly unit by the same number of wounds. This can resurrect models.

Name: Rattack Formation
Power: Spell - Target a friendly unit within 2. It immediately makes a full attack. It can still fight in combat. Ranged Spell - Can't be cast while in combat.
